CodeEditorModel.Text:
'************************************************************************************* '* Recipe management '* Autor: Pierre Clot '* Date: 29.12.2022 '* Version: 11 '* '* Description : '* Management of recipe system for all HMI project ! '* '* v11: Use VB directive to disabled all PCS part to have only one manager for '* every project
'* v10: Use standard path from "S_Path" '* '* v9: Update machine name after the confirmation of recipe loaded. '* '* v8: Add delete SD card function '* '* v7: Add transfert function '* Fixed the "SD card full" bug by testing if an SD card is in the screen '* before making the backup '* '* v6: Create info of master recipe '* Check is machine recipe existe when master recipe is loaded '* Add pop-up info '* '* v5: Delete recipe status, not usefull for master recipe. '* Cleaning "Recipe loaded" after the next loading (master and machine) '* Lock replace master function. '* Patch backup functions. '* '* v4: Create new recipe with all currents machines values, and not only with '* selected one. '* '*************************************************************************************
' Rcp.Master as two different definition ' - For PCS: The master recipe ' - Standalone: The recipe of current machine
' Choose if the project is a PCS
#Const Is_PCS = false
' Pop up icone Private Const ICON_SAVE = "THE_FA_Backup_Save" Private Const ICON_LOAD = "THE_FA_Backup_Load" Private Const ICON_COMPARE = "THE_FA_Magnifer" Private Const ICON_DELETE = "THE_FA_Trash" Private Const ICON_DSCARD = "THE_FA_SD_Card"
' Working variable Private Dim _str As String Private Dim _items() As String
#If Is_PCS Then
''' <summary> ''' Check every machine enabled and with recipe to create a dynamique list of recipe. ''' </summary> Sub Fill_Viewer
Dim i As UShort ' Indice of list machine Dim j As UShort = 0 ' Indice of list recipe
' Fill recipes list For i=0 To MachineMax If Machine(i).Enabled And Machine(i).Recipe Then
' Reset recipes values Rcp.Viewer(j).Name = "" Rcp.Viewer(j).Instance = ""
' Save indice Rcp.Viewer(j).Id = j
' Read machines datas (Code / Name machine) Rcp.Viewer(j).Code = Machine(i).Code Rcp.Viewer(j).Template = "Rcp_" + Machine(i).Code
If Machine(i).Number < 10 Then Rcp.Viewer(j).Title = "M0" + CStr(Machine(i).Number) + " - " + Machine(i).Name Else Rcp.Viewer(j).Title = "M" + CStr(Machine(i).Number) + " - " + Machine(i).Name End If
' Inc indice j += 1 End If Next i ' Backup the number of recipe Rcp.ViewerMax = j - 1
' Fill master datas Rcp.Master.Template = "Recipe_Master"
' Recipe can't be loaded Rcp.Ready = False End Sub
#End If
#Region "Load recipes"
''' <summary> ''' Load all selected machine recipe ''' </summary> Public Sub Load
' Add handler to get the response from user RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadReturn AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadReturn
' Open pop up message box Call S_PopUp.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_LoadConf"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Load"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Warning, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.YesNo )
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Response of user to load a recipe ''' </summary> Private Sub _LoadReturn(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadReturn
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then _Load() End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Internal subroutine to load selected recipe(s) ''' </summary> Private Sub _Load
' For each recipe For i=0 To Rcp.ViewerMax
' Check if local machine as a recipe selected If Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance <> "" Then
' Load the recipe WriteRecipeToController(Rcp.Viewer(i).Template , Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance)
' Write recipe loaded Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance = "" Rcp.Viewer(i).Name = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Loaded")
Else ' v5: ' If the machine as no instance, but perhapse the text "Recipe loaded", clean it ! Rcp.Viewer(i).Name = ""
End If Next i
' Clean master text If Rcp.Master.Instance <> "" Then ' Put master recipe name in header 'Rcp.Info = Rcp.Master.Name (v5) Rcp_Master = Rcp.Master.Name
' Clear master data on recipe page Rcp.Master.Name = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Loaded") Rcp.Master.Instance = ""
Else ' v5: ' If the master as no instance, but perhapse the text "Recipe loaded", clean it ! Rcp.Master.Name = ""
End If
' Recipe can't be loaded Rcp.Ready = False
' Add handler to get the response from user RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadSuccess AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadSuccess
' Open pop up message box Call S_PopUp.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_LoadSuccess"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Load"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Success)
' Update recipe for other screen HMI.Recipe.Update = True
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Response of user to load a recipe ''' </summary> Private Sub _LoadSuccess(btn As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadSuccess
' For the PCS, we must update the machine list to have the recipes name Call S_Startup.Machine_Def
' For other machine, update the info text 'Call Update
End Sub
#End Region
#Region "Machine recipe management"
''' <summary> ''' Save a new recipe. Arguments are : ''' - Code: Name of the machine ''' - Template: Template name (Rcp_Code) ''' - Name_New: User name of the recipe ''' </summary> Sub Save
' Instance of new recipe : "CODE_yyyy_MM_dd_HHmmss" Rcp.Arg.Instance = Rcp.Arg.Code + "_" + Date.Now.ToString("yyyy_MM_dd_HHmmss")
' Save all recipes to the CSV file TEST PATCH ' SaveAllRecipes(Rcp.Arg.Template)
' Create new recipe instance in NA memory Addrecipe(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
' Load value from PLC in NA memory ReadRecipeFromController(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
' Set the new user recipe name SetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance, "Name_User", Rcp.Arg.Name_New)
' Save instance from NA memory to file database ' SaveRecipe(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
' Save all recipes to the CSV file TEST SaveAllRecipes(Rcp.Arg.Template)
' Update status ' Call Update Call FileBackup
' v6: Show popup _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_SaveSuccess") + ":" + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine + " " + GetResourceString("THE_A_Name") + ": " + Rcp.Arg.Name_New + Environment.NewLine + " " + GetResourceString("THE_A_Machine") + ": " + Rcp.Arg.Code S_Popup.MsgBox(_str, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Save"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Success)
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Save recipe on existing recipe. ''' </summary> Sub Replace
' Load value from PLC in NA memory ReadRecipeFromController(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
' Set the new user recipe name SetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance, "Name_User", Rcp.Arg.Name_User)
' Save instance from NA memory to file database SaveRecipe(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
' Log new recipe created ' Call S_Log.RecipeCreated
' Update status ' Call Update Call FileBackup
' v6: Show popup _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_ReplaceSuccess") + ":" + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine + " " + GetResourceString("THE_A_Name") + ": " + Rcp.Arg.Name_User + Environment.NewLine + " " + GetResourceString("THE_A_Machine") + ": " + Rcp.Arg.Code S_Popup.MsgBox(_str, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Save"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Success)
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Delete the selected recipe. Check where the recipie is used in all master and ask user the confirmation. ''' </summary> ''' <param name="Template">Template of the recipe to delete</param> ''' <param name="Instance">Instance of the recipe to delete</param> Sub Delete(Template As String, Instance As String)
'************************* Check if the recipe is a machine recipe ************************* If Template.Substring(0, 4) = "Rcp_" Then
'************************* Check the position inside the master recipe ************************* Dim i As Short ' Indice of list machine Dim pos As Short = -1 ' Machine position in viewer
' For each machine recipe in viewer For i=0 To 14 If Rcp.Viewer(i).Template = Template Then pos = i End If Next i
' If machine is find in viewer If pos > -1 Then
'************************* For each master recipe, check if the machine recipe is used ************************* Dim listMaster() As String Dim max As Integer Dim Ingrediant As String = "Instance_" + pos.ToString
' Load list of template and number of items listMaster=GetRecipeNames("Recipe_Master") max=listMaster.GetUpperBound(0) ' Temp_Str = "Max: " + max.ToString + " / Ingrediant:" + Ingrediant ' Resize the users names list to have the same size as the number of recipes Array.Resize(_items, max+1) Array.Clear(_items, 0, max+1)
Dim j As Integer = 0 Dim ok As Boolean
' For all master recipe For i=0 To max ' Temp_Str = Temp_STR + Environment.NewLine + listMaster(i) + " / i:" + i.ToString + " / j:" + j.ToString + " / Como:" + GetRecipeIngredientValue("Recipe_Master", listMaster(i), Ingrediant) + " = " + Instance ' Check if recipe to delete is part of the master recipe If GetRecipeIngredientValue("Recipe_Master", listMaster(i), Ingrediant) = Instance Then _items(j) = listMaster(i) j += 1 End If
Next i
' Resize the array and set limit Array.Resize(_items, j) max = j-1
'************************* Ask user the confirmation ************************* If j = 0 Then _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteQuestion") + "?" Else _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteQuestion") + "? " + GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteQuestionMaster") + ":"
For i=0 To max _str = _str + Environment.NewLine + "- " + GetRecipeIngredientValue("Recipe_Master", _items(i), "Name_User") Next i
End If
' Add handler to get the response from user RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteReturn AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteReturn
' Backup datas Rcp.Arg.Template = Template Rcp.Arg.Instance = Instance Rcp.Arg.Nb = max
' Call message box S_Popup.MsgBox(_str, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Recipe"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Question, S_Popup.MessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel)
' NEXT STEP IN _DeleteReturn
Else ' Machine not found in viewer S_Popup.MsgBox("Machine not found in viewer", GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Recipe"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur) End If
Else ' Not the good recipe _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Error_NotMachine") + "!" S_Popup.MsgBox(_str, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Recipe"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur) End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Response of user to delete a recipe ''' Rcp.Arg.Template = Template ''' Rcp.Arg.Instance = Instance ''' Rcp.Arg.Nb = max ''' </summary> Private Sub _DeleteReturn(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteReturn
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then
'************************* Delete slave recipe ************************* DeleteRecipe(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
'************************* For each master recipe, delete the machine recipe ************************* If Rcp.Arg.Nb > 0 Then Dim i As Short = 0 Dim j As Short = 0 Dim Ingrediant As String
' For all backup master recipe For i=0 To Rcp.Arg.Nb
' For all machines in the master recipe For j=0 To Rcp.ViewerMax
Ingrediant = "Instance_" + j.ToString
' Check if recipe to delete is part of the master recipe If GetRecipeIngredientValue("Recipe_Master", _items(i), Ingrediant) = Rcp.Arg.Instance Then SetRecipeIngredientValue("Recipe_Master", _items(i), Ingrediant, "") End If
Next j
Next i
End If
'************************* Backup all recipes ************************* SaveAllRecipes("Recipe_Master")
' Update status Call FileBackup
' v6: Show popup S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteSuccess"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Save"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Success)
End If
End Sub
#Region "Mirroring recipes"
''' <summary> ''' Save a copy of the last saving recipe in another template. Must be used after a Save fonction, because it reuse the same instance name. ''' The second template must be specified in Arg_2 ''' </summary> Sub Mirror_Save
' Create template of destination Dim TemplateDest As String = "Rcp_" + Rcp.Arg.Arg_2
' Create new recipe instance in NA memory Addrecipe(TemplateDest, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
'******************* Get all ingrediant from the source recipe ******************* Dim ListIngrediants() As String Dim max As Integer =0 Dim i As Integer Dim Value As String
' Get all ingredient of source template ListIngrediants = GetRecipeIngredientNames(Rcp.Arg.Template) max=ListIngrediants.Length-1
' Copy all ingredient value from source to new recipe For i =0 To max ' Get value Value = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance, ListIngrediants(i) ) ' Set value SetRecipeIngredientValue(TemplateDest, Rcp.Arg.Instance, ListIngrediants(i), Value) Next '*************************************************************************************
' Update name of template to backup the good file Rcp.Arg.Template = TemplateDest Rcp.Arg.Arg_2 = ""
' Save instance from NA memory to file database ' SaveRecipe(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
' Save all recipes to the CSV file TEST SaveAllRecipes(Rcp.Arg.Template)
' Log new recipe created ' Call S_Log.RecipeCreated
' Update status ' Call Update Call FileBackup
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Save a copy of the last replaced recipe in another template. Must be used after a Replace fonction, because it reuse the same instance name. ''' The second template must be specified in Arg_2 ''' </summary> Sub Mirror_Replace
' Create template of destination Dim TemplateDest As String = "Rcp_" + Rcp.Arg.Arg_2
'******************* Get all ingrediants from the source recipe ******************* Dim ListIngrediants() As String Dim max As Integer =0 Dim i As Integer Dim Value As String
' Get all ingredient of source template ListIngrediants = GetRecipeIngredientNames(Rcp.Arg.Template) max=ListIngrediants.Length-1
' Copy all ingredient value from source to new recipe For i =0 To max ' Get value Value = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance, ListIngrediants(i) ) ' Set value SetRecipeIngredientValue(TemplateDest, Rcp.Arg.Instance, ListIngrediants(i), Value) Next '*************************************************************************************
' Update name of template to backup the good file Rcp.Arg.Template = TemplateDest Rcp.Arg.Arg_2 = ""
' Save instance from NA memory to file database SaveRecipe(Rcp.Arg.Template, Rcp.Arg.Instance)
' Log new recipe created ' Call S_Log.RecipeCreated
' Update status ' Call Update Call FileBackup End Sub
#End Region
#End Region
#Region "Master recipes management"
''' <summary> ''' Create new master recipe in memory card. ''' The recipe instance name come from the date and is name is save in Rcp struc. ''' </summary> Sub Master_Create
'v5 If Not Rcp.Create Then Dim i As Short
' Create name and recipe Rcp.Master.Instance = "Master_" + Date.Now.ToString("yyyy_MM_dd_HHmmss") AddRecipe("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance)
' Save name ' SetRecipeIngredientValue("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance, "Name_User", Rcp.Arg.Name_User) ' Write recipe in controller ' WriteRecipeToController("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance)
' Save name and save all current recipes Rcp.Master.Name = Rcp.Arg.Name_User ReadRecipeFromController("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance)
' Update status 'v5 Rcp.Create = True 'v5 Rcp.Edited = False 'v5 Rcp.Loaded = False
' Load info 'v5 Rcp.Info = GetResourceString("Rcp_CreateMaster")
' Call internal save master _MasterSave()
' v6: Show popup _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_MasterCreate") + ":" + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine + " - " + Rcp.Master.Name S_Popup.MsgBox(_str, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Save"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Success)
'v5 End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Create and save all machines recipe and create a master recipe with each machine recipe. ''' </summary> Sub Master_CreateWithMachine
'v5 If Not Rcp.Create Then Dim i As Short Dim DateStr As String
' Create name of all recipe DateStr = Date.Now.ToString("yyyy_MM_dd_HHmmss")
' Save all recipes to the CSV file TEST 'SaveAllRecipes("Recipe_Master")
' Create name and recipe Rcp.Master.Instance = "Master_" + DateStr Addrecipe("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance)
' Save name Rcp.Master.Name = Rcp.Arg.Name_User
' Write recipe in controller to init all value and clear ReadRecipeFromController("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance) Rcp.Master.Name = Rcp.Arg.Name_User
' Update status 'v5 Rcp.Create = True 'v5 Rcp.Edited = False 'v5 Rcp.Loaded = False
' For each recipe For i=0 To Rcp.ViewerMax
' Reset recipes values Rcp.Viewer(i).Name = Rcp.Arg.Name_User Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance = Rcp.Viewer(i).Code + "_" + DateStr
' Save all recipes to the CSV file TEST 'SaveAllRecipes(Rcp.Viewer(i).Template)
' Create new recipe instance in NA memory Addrecipe(Rcp.Viewer(i).Template, Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance)
' Load value from PLC in NA memory ReadRecipeFromController(Rcp.Viewer(i).Template, Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance)
' Set the new user recipe name SetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Viewer(i).Template, Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance, "Name_User", Rcp.Arg.Name_User)
' Save instance from NA memory to file database 'SaveRecipe(Rcp.Viewer(i).Template, Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance)
' Save all recipes to the CSV file TEST SaveAllRecipes(Rcp.Viewer(i).Template)
Next i
' Load value from PLC in NA memory ReadRecipeFromController("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance)
' Load info 'v5 Rcp.Info = GetResourceString("THE_Start_Creating")
' Call internal save master _MasterSave()
' v6: Show popup _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_MasterCreateAll") + ":" + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine + " - " + Rcp.Master.Name S_Popup.MsgBox(_str, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Save"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Success)
'v5 End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Load recipe master. It will fill all machine recipe on viewer for the current recipe (Rcp.Master.Instance) ''' </summary> Sub Master_Load
Dim instance As String 'Intance of machine recipe Dim template As String
' For each instance in recipe For i=0 To Rcp.Viewer.Length -1
' Read value of instance instance = GetRecipeIngredientValue("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance, "Instance_" + i.ToString)
' If name is used If instance <> "" Then ' Read recipe instance and name template = "Rcp_" + instance.Substring(0, instance.IndexOf("_", 0) ) ' FAUX
' Get name of the recipe Rcp.Viewer(i).Name = GetRecipeIngredientValue(template, instance, "Name_User")
' Check if the name is loaded If Rcp.Viewer(i).Name <> "" Then ' Write title Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance = instance
Else ' v6: If the name is null, the recipe dosn't existe Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance = "" Rcp.Viewer(i).Name = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_FailLoad") End If
' Recipe can be loaded Rcp.Ready = True Else Rcp.Viewer(i).Name = "" Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance ="" End If Next i
' Load info au master recipe Rcp.Master.Name = GetRecipeIngredientValue("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance, "Name_User")
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Save the master recipe ''' </summary> Sub Master_Save
' Call internal save master _MasterSave()
' v6: Show popup _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_MasterSave") + ":" + Environment.NewLine + Environment.NewLine + " " + GetResourceString("THE_A_Name") + ": " + Rcp.Master.Name S_Popup.MsgBox(_str, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Save"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Success)
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Save the master recipe ''' </summary> Private Sub _MasterSave
' Load value from PLC in NA memory ReadRecipeFromController("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance)
' Save instance from NA memory to file database 'SaveRecipeAs("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance) SaveAllRecipes("Recipe_Master")
' Update status Call FileBackup
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Delete selected master recipe. ''' </summary> Sub Master_Delete
' Add handler to get the response from user RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _MasterDeleteReturn AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _MasterDeleteReturn
' Call message box _str = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteQuestion") + "?" S_Popup.MsgBox(_str, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Recipe"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Question, S_Popup.MessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel)
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Response of user to delete a master recipe ''' </summary> Private Sub _MasterDeleteReturn(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _MasterDeleteReturn
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then
' Delete current recipe DeleteRecipe("Recipe_Master", Rcp.Master.Instance)
' Delete master info Rcp.Master.Name = "" Rcp.Master.Instance = ""
' Clean all recipe field Dim i As Short For i=0 To Rcp.ViewerMax Rcp.Viewer(i).Name = "" Rcp.Viewer(i).Instance = "" Next i
' Reset status Rcp.Ready = False 'v5 Rcp.Create = False 'v5 Rcp.Edited = False 'v5 Rcp.Loaded = False
' Call Update Call FileBackup
' v6: Show popup S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteSuccess"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Recipe"), S_Popup.MessageBoxIcon.Success) End If
End Sub
#End Region
#Region "File management"
' Load recipe at startup ''' <summary> ''' At startup, upload all recipe file from SD card to NA project. ''' Without this, when a project is send to NA, every recipe of NA will be overwrited by recipe in project. ''' </summary> Sub Startup
Dim i As Integer Dim Source As String
' Fill status of recipe Rcp.Status.NotStarted = True
Try ' Import recipe file for each machines recipes For i=0 To Rcp.ViewerMax ' Create file path Source = S_Path.RECIPES & Rcp.Viewer(i).Template & ".csv"
' Load recipe if file existe If System.IO.File.Exists(Source) Then ImportRecipes(Rcp.Viewer(i).Template, Source) End If Next i
' Import recipe file for master recipe Source = S_Path.RECIPES & Rcp.Master.Template & ".csv"
' Load recipe if file existe If System.IO.File.Exists(Source) Then ImportRecipes(Rcp.Master.Template , Source) End If
Catch Ex As System.Exception ' If recipe is not loaded, update status Rcp.Status.Text = GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_FailLoad") End Try End Sub
''' <summary> ''' When selected recipe is updated, backup the recipe file in SD card. ''' </summary> Sub FileBackup
'v7: If the SD directory doesn't exist, exit with message box If Not S_Path.SD_IsPresent Then ' Show pop-up (perhaps don't work because already open !) S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_SDCard_Missing"), GetResourceString("THE_A_Backup"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, "THE_FA_SD_Card")
Exit Sub End If
' Create path if dosen't existe If Not System.IO.Directory.Exists(S_Path.RECIPES) Then System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory(S_Path.RECIPES) End If
' Save recipe file in SD card Try Dim Source As String Dim Dest As String
' Import recipe file for each machines recipes For i=0 To Rcp.ViewerMax
' Set path Source = "\User\SysmacHMI\" & Rcp.Viewer(i).Template & ".csv" Dest = S_Path.RECIPES & Rcp.Viewer(i).Template & ".csv"
' Copy BDD file System.IO.File.Copy(Source, Dest, True)
Next i
' Import recipe file for master recipe Source = "\User\SysmacHMI\" & Rcp.Master.Template & ".csv" Dest = S_Path.RECIPES & Rcp.Master.Template & ".csv"
' Copy BDD file System.IO.File.Copy(Source, Dest, True)
Catch Ex As System.Exception ' If recipe can't be save, update status S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_FailSD"), GetResourceString("THE_A_Backup"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_DSCARD) End Try
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Delete SD card directory! In some case, the SD card directory is created on the NA internal memory (v8) ''' </summary> Public Sub DeleteSD
' Add handler to get the response from user RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Remove AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Remove
'If the SD directory doesn't exist, exit with message box S_Popup.MsgBox("Warning! You will have the risk to delete all the contant of your SD card!" + Environment.NewLine + "Are you sure to start the sequence ?", "Warning - Delete SD card !", S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Warning, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.YesNo, "THE_FA_SD-Card") End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Remove SD card and ask user to remove the SD card (v8) ''' </summary> ''' <param name="button"></param> Private Sub _DeleteSD_Remove(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Remove
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then
' Eject SD card 'EjectSDMemory() It freeze the screen!!!
' Ask user to remove SD card RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Test AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Test
'If the SD directory doesn't exist, exit with message box S_Popup.MsgBox("Remove the SD card of NA screen and confirme when the operation is done.", "Warning - Delete SD card !", S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Info, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OKCancel, "THE_FA_SD-Card") End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Test if the SD card directory existe.(v8) ''' </summary> ''' <param name="button"></param> Private Sub _DeleteSD_Test(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Test
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.OK Then
' Check if the directory exist If S_Path.SD_IsPresent Then
' Ask user to delete SD card directory on internal memory RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Delete AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Delete
' The directory existe in the internal memory S_Popup.MsgBox("A directory on the internal memory is found! Do you want to delete it?", "Warning - Delete SD card !", S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OKCancel, "THE_FA_SD-Card")
Else
'If the SD directory doesn't exist, exit with message box S_Popup.MsgBox("No bad directories are detected in the NA's internal memory! ", "Warning - Delete SD card !", S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Success, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, "THE_FA_SD-Card")
End If End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Test if the SD card directory existe.(v8) ''' </summary> ''' <param name="button"></param> Private Sub _DeleteSD_Delete(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteSD_Delete
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.OK Then
' Delete the SD card directory on the NA System.IO.Directory.Delete(S_Path.SD, True)
' Confirm ! S_Popup.MsgBox("The directories are deleted from the NA's internal memory! ", "Warning - Delete SD card !", S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Success, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, "THE_FA_SD-Card") End If
End Sub
#End Region
#Region "Transfert"
' Output format to compare Private Const COMPARE = "{0} {1} {2}" ' Old: "{0} {1} {2}"
' List of recipe for navigation Public Dim _listLocal(), _listLocalUser() As String Public Dim _listExterne(), _listExterneUser() As String
#Region "Transfert - Filling array"
''' <summary> ''' Get all recipe from NA and external drive. ''' </summary> Sub Transfert_Fill
Rcp.Transfert.Template = "Rcp_SLT"
Call CheckUSB
Call Fill_Local Call Fill_Externe
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Get recipe from HMI, and save in local array. ''' </summary> Private Sub Fill_Local
Dim i As UShort ' Indice of list machine Dim ary() As String Dim filter As Object
' Load list of template and number of items ary = GetRecipeNames(Rcp.Transfert.Template)
' If we don't have recipe If ary Is Nothing Then Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local = 0 Exit Sub End If
' Save the number of element Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local=ary.GetUpperBound(0)+1
' Resize the users names list to have the same size as the number of recipes Array.Resize(_listLocal, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local) Array.Resize(_listLocalUser, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local) Array.Clear(_listLocalUser, 0, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local)
' For each recipe For Each str As String In ary
' Load model for filtring function filter = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, str, "Model")
' Il the recipe don't have If filter Is Nothing Then filter = Rcp.Transfert.Filter End If
' If the current model match OR filter is not used If filter = Rcp.Transfert.Filter Or Rcp.Transfert.Filter = -1 Then
' Read first line with the name, and save the path _listLocal(i) = str _listLocalUser(i) = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, str, "Name_User").ToString
i=i+1 End If Next
' Resize the recipes list if some element are filtred If i < Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local Then Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local=i Array.Resize(_listLocal, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local) Array.Resize(_listLocalUser, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Local) End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Get recipe from memory card, and save in local array. ''' </summary> Private Sub Fill_Externe
' Get list of file in the tamplate directory Dim i As UShort ' Indice of list machine Dim Source As String = S_Path.RECIPES & Rcp.Transfert.Template & "\"
' Check if the directory exist If System.IO.Directory.Exists(Source) Then
Dim files() As String = System.IO.Directory.GetFiles(Source) Dim name, filter, ary() As String
' Save the number of element Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe = files.Length Array.Resize(_listExterne, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe) Array.Resize(_listExterneUser, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe) i = 0
' For each file For Each file As String In files
' Check the extension If file.EndsWith(".the") Then ' Open the file to read from. Using sr As System.IO.StreamReader = System.IO.File.OpenText(file)
' Read name and filter name = sr.ReadLine() filter = sr.ReadLine()
' If the current model match OR filter is not used If filter = Rcp.Transfert.Filter.ToString Or Rcp.Transfert.Filter.ToString = -1 Then
' Read first line with the name, and save the path _listExterne(i) = file _listExterneUser(i) = name
i=i+1 End If
End Using End If Next
' If no file is detected If i = 0 Then ' Set no file detected Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe = 0 Else
' Update the number of file if some file don't have the .the If i < Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe Then Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe = i
' Resize array Array.Resize(_listExterne, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe) Array.Resize(_listExterneUser, Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe) End If End If
Else ' Set no file detected Rcp.Transfert.Max_Externe = 0 End If
End Sub
#End Region
#Region "Transfert - Save to file"
Private _tempSource, _tempRecipe As String
''' <summary> ''' Save recipe to a file on the USB device. The template is define in Rcp.Transfert.Template ''' </summary> ''' <param name="recipe">Recipe to save in file. Without parameter, take value from Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Local</param> Public Sub SaveToFile(Optional recipe As String = Nothing)
' If parameter is not set, use the value from structure If recipe = Nothing Then recipe = Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Local End If
Dim obj As Object
' Get recipe name obj = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, "Name_User")
' Exit if recipe doesn't existe If obj Is Nothing Then ' User name is missing S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_NameUserMissing"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_SaveToFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, ICON_SAVE) Exit Sub End If
' Exit if any USB device are found If USB_Path = "" Then ' Msg: The USB device is not detected. S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_MissingUSB"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_SaveToFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, ICON_SAVE) Exit Sub End If
' Create path if dosen't existe If (Not System.IO.Directory.Exists(S_Path.RECIPES & Rcp.Transfert.Template)) Then System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory(S_Path.RECIPES & Rcp.Transfert.Template) End If
' Import recipe file for master recipe _tempSource = S_Path.RECIPES & Rcp.Transfert.Template & "\" & recipe &".the"
' Check if a file existe in the USB device If ( System.IO.File.Exists(_tempSource) ) Then
' Compare the file and the recipe Dim text As String = CompareToText(recipe, _tempSource)
If text Is Nothing Then ' No diffrence S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_SaveAlready"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_SaveToFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Info, ICON_SAVE) Exit Sub Else ' Some differances are found _tempRecipe = recipe
' Ask user if he want replace the current recipe RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _SaveToFileReturn AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _SaveToFileReturn
' Msg: Do you want to replace the existing file despite the following differences: Call S_PopUp.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_ReplaceDifferences") + Environment.NewLine + text , GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Replace"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.YesNo, ICON_SAVE) End If
Else ' If the file doesn't existe, save thee recipe to file Call _SaveToFile(recipe, _tempSource)
End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Response of user to replace the parameter of an existing recipe ''' </summary> Private Sub _SaveToFileReturn(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _SaveToFileReturn
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then ' Load parameter from file Call _SaveToFile(_tempRecipe, _tempSource)
End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Save recipe to a file on the USB device. The template is define in Rcp.Transfert.Template ''' </summary> ''' <param name="recipe"></param> Private Sub _SaveToFile(recipe As String, source As String)
Dim ingredients() As String Dim obj As Object
' Get all ingrediant ingredients = GetRecipeIngredientNames(Rcp.Transfert.Template)
' Create the file Using sw As System.IO.StreamWriter = System.IO.File.CreateText(source)
' Get recipe name obj = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, "Name_User")
If obj Is Nothing Then ' User name is missing S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_NameUserMissing"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_SaveToFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, ICON_SAVE) Exit Sub Else ' Write in line 1 the name of recipe sw.WriteLine(obj.ToString) ingredients = Remove(ingredients, "Name_User") End If
' Get model of the machine obj = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, "Model")
If obj Is Nothing Then ' Write in line 2 the model of the machine sw.WriteLine("-1") Else ' Write in line 2 the model of the machine sw.WriteLine(obj.ToString) ingredients = Remove(ingredients, "Model") End If
' Get all other ingredients For Each str In ingredients ' Get object obj = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, str) sw.WriteLine( str + "ยง" + obj.GetType.ToString + "ยง" + obj.ToString ) Next
End Using
' Update list Call Fill_Externe Rcp.Transfert.Update = True
' Info for user S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Saved"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_SaveToFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Success, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_SAVE)
End Sub
#End Region
#Region "Transfert - Load From file"
Private _tempPath, _tempRcp As String
''' <summary> ''' Load a recipe from a file. The template is define in Rcp.Transfert.Template. ''' </summary> ''' <param name="path">Path of the file to load. Without parameter, take value from Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Externe</param> Public Sub LoadFromFile(Optional path As String = Nothing)
' If parameter is not set, use the value from structure If path = Nothing Then path = Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Externe End If
Dim recipe, tmp As String Dim ary() As String
' If the file doesn't exist, exit with message box If Not System.IO.File.Exists(path) Then ' Msg: The file doesn't exist S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_FileMissing"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_LoadFromFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_LOAD) Exit Sub End If
' Get recipe name ary =path.Split(New Char() {"\"c}) ' Split directory of path recipe = ary(ary.GetUpperBound(0) ) ' Get last directory recipe = recipe.Replace(".the", "") ' Delete extension
' Check if the recipe doesn't existe If GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, "Name_User") Is Nothing Then ' Create recipe AddRecipe(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe)
' Load parameter from file Call _LoadFromFile(recipe, path) Else ' Save parameter _tempPath = path _tempRcp = recipe
' Compare file and recipe Dim text As String = CompareToText(_tempRcp, _tempPath)
' If the recipe is the same If text Is Nothing Then ' Msg: No differance between the recipe and the file, transfert stopped S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_CompareSameTransfert"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_LoadFromFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Info, ICON_LOAD) Exit Sub End If
' Ask user if he want replace the current recipe RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadFromFileReturn AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadFromFileReturn
' Msg: The recipe is already in the machine. Do you want to replace it? Cancel to compare. Call S_PopUp.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_CompareDiff"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_LoadFromFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Warning, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.YesNoCancel, ICON_LOAD)
End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Response of user to replace the parameter of an existing recipe ''' </summary> Private Sub _LoadFromFileReturn(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' If response is Yes, load the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then ' Load parameter from file Call _LoadFromFile(_tempRcp, _tempPath)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadFromFileReturn
' If response is Cancel, compart the parameter Else If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Cancel Then
Dim text As String = CompareToText(_tempRcp, _tempPath)
' If the recipe is the same If text Is Nothing Then ' Msg: No differance between the recipe and the file, transfert stopped S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_CompareSameTransfert"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_LoadFromFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Info, ICON_LOAD)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadFromFileReturn Else ' Ask user if a want to remplace the recipe Msg: Do you want to replace the existing file despite the following differences: Call S_PopUp.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_ReplaceDifferences") + Environment.NewLine + text, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Replace"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.YesNo, ICON_LOAD) End If
Else ' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _LoadFromFileReturn End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Internal function for loading all parameter from a file to a recipe. The recipe and the file must be tested befor. ''' </summary> ''' <param name="recipe">Destination recipe</param> ''' <param name="path">Path of the file to load</param> Private Sub _LoadFromFile(recipe As String, path As String)
Dim line, key, val As String Dim obj As New Object Dim ary() As String
' Open the file to read from. Using sr As System.IO.StreamReader = System.IO.File.OpenText(path)
' Get title of recipe, and save it line = sr.ReadLine() SetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, "Name_User", line)
' Get model of machine and the object line = sr.ReadLine() obj = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, "Model") If Not obj Is Nothing Then ' if model is used on the recipe, save it SetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, "Model", line) End If
' For each line in the file Do ' Read current line line = sr.ReadLine()
' Check If Not (line Is Nothing) Then
' Find position of ; ary =line.Split(New Char() {"ยง"c})
If (ary.Length = 3) Then
key = ary(0) val = ary(2)
' Create object Select Case ary(1) Case "System.Boolean" obj = CType(val, Boolean) Case "System.Byte" obj = CType(val, Byte) Case "System.SByte" obj = CType(val, SByte) Case "System.Single" obj = CType(val, Single) Case "System.String" obj = CType(val, String) End Select
' Set value SetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, key, obj)
End If End If
Loop Until line Is Nothing
End Using
' Save recipes SaveRecipe(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe)
' Update liste of local recipe Call Fill_Local Rcp.Transfert.Update = True
' Update status Call FileBackup
' Info for user S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Loaded"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_LoadFromFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Success, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_LOAD)
End Sub
#End Region
#Region "Transfert - Compare"
''' <summary> ''' Compare a recipe with a recipe file. ''' </summary> ''' <param name="recipe">Name o</param> ''' <param name="path"></param> Public Sub CompareWithFile(Optional recipe As String = Nothing, Optional path As String = Nothing)
' If parameter is not set, use the value from structure If recipe = Nothing Then recipe = Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Local End If ' If parameter is not set, use the value from structure If path = Nothing Then path = Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Externe End If
' If the file doesn't exist, exit with message box If Not System.IO.File.Exists(path) Then S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_FileMissing"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Compare"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_COMPARE) Exit Sub End If
' If the recipe doesn't exist, exit with message box If GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, "Name_User") Is Nothing Then S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("Rcp_RecipeMissing"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Compare"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_COMPARE) Exit Sub End If
Dim text As String
text = CompareToText(recipe, path)
' Open message box If text Is Nothing Then ' Text not differance S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_CompareSame"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Compare"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Info, ICON_COMPARE) Else ' Text of comparaison S_Popup.MsgBox(text, GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Compare"), ICON_COMPARE) End If
End Sub
Private Function CompareToText(recipe As String, path As String) As String
Dim line, key, val As String Dim text As String Dim objRcp, objFile As New Object Dim ary(), ingredients() As String
' Get all ingrediant ingredients = GetRecipeIngredientNames(Rcp.Transfert.Template)
' Delete special ingredients ingredients = Remove(ingredients, "Name_User") ingredients = Remove(ingredients, "Model")
' Open the file to read from. Using sr As System.IO.StreamReader = System.IO.File.OpenText(path)
' Read name of recipe line = sr.ReadLine()
Do ' Read current line line = sr.ReadLine()
' Check If Not (line Is Nothing) Then
' Find position of ; ary =line.Split(New Char() {"ยง"c})
If (ary.Length = 3) Then
key = ary(0) val = ary(2)
' Create object Select Case ary(1) Case "System.Boolean" objFile = CType(val, Boolean) Case "System.Byte" objFile = CType(val, Byte) Case "System.SByte" objFile = CType(val, SByte) Case "System.Single" objFile = CType(val, Single) Case "System.String" objFile = CType(val, String) End Select
' Get object from recipe objRcp = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, key)
' Chech if ingredient don't existe on recipe If objRcp Is Nothing Then ' Add ingredient founds in file, but not in recipe text = text + Environment.NewLine + String.Format(COMPARE , key.PadRight(26," ") , objFile.ToString.PadRight(5," "), "N/A") Else ' Delete ingredient found in the recipe ingredients = Remove(ingredients, key)
' Compare object If objFile <> objRcp Then ' Add text text = text + Environment.NewLine + String.Format(COMPARE , key.PadRight(26," ") , objFile.ToString.PadRight(5," "), objRcp.ToString) End If
End If
End If End If
Loop Until line Is Nothing
End Using
' Add all ingredients founds in recipe, but not in file For Each str In ingredients ' Add text text = text + Environment.NewLine + String.Format(COMPARE , str.PadRight(26," ") , "N/A ", GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, recipe, str) ) Next
' Open message box If text Is Nothing Then Return Nothing Else ' Add title text = String.Format(COMPARE , "Name " , "File", "Recipe" ) + text
Return text End If End Function
#End Region
#Region "Transfert - USB"
''' <summary> ''' Run in simulation or on an NA. ''' </summary> Private _IsSimulation = False
''' <summary> ''' Current USB path selected ''' </summary> Public Property USB_Path As String
Get ' For simulation, the path must start with \ char If _IsSimulation Then
If _USBpath = "" Then Return "" ' It must stay empty when no path selected Else Return "\" + _USBpath ' For simulation, the path must start with \ char, but not on a NA End If Else Return _USBpath End If End Get
Private Set(ByVal value As String) ' Check if the state change If _USBpath <> value Then
' Update value _USBpath = value Rcp.Transfert.USB_Path = value
' Update datas and ask page to update the view Fill_Externe Rcp.Transfert.Pos_Externe = -1 Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Externe = "" Rcp.Transfert.Update = True
End If End Set
End Property Private _USBpath As String = ""
''' <summary> ''' The NA have an USB device on port 1 ''' </summary> Public Property AsUSB1 As Boolean
Get Return _AsUSB1 End Get
Private Set(ByVal value As Boolean)
' Check if the state change If _AsUSB1 <> value Then
' Set path If value Then ' When USB stick is detected, and no path selected If USB_Path = "" Then USB_Path = S_Path.USB1 'Set path for USB 1 End If Else ' When USB stick is not detected, reset path If USB_Path = S_Path.USB1 Then ' Except if USB 2 is enabled If (_AsUSB2) USB_Path = S_Path.USB2 'Set path for USB 2 Else USB_Path = "" End If End If End If
' Update value _AsUSB1 = value Rcp.Transfert.As_USB1 = value End If
End Set
End Property Private _AsUSB1 As Boolean = False
''' <summary> ''' The NA have an USB device on port 2 ''' </summary> Public Property AsUSB2 As Boolean
Get Return _AsUSB2 End Get
Private Set(ByVal value As Boolean)
' Check if the state change If _AsUSB2 <> value Then
' Set path If value Then ' When USB stick is detected, and no path selected If USB_Path = "" Then USB_Path = S_Path.USB2 'Set path for USB 2 End If Else ' When USB stick is not detected, reset path If USB_Path = S_Path.USB2 Then ' Except if USB 2 is enabled If (_AsUSB1) USB_Path = S_Path.USB1 'Set path for USB 1 Else USB_Path = "" End If End If End If
' Update value _AsUSB2 = value Rcp.Transfert.As_USB2 = value End If
End Set
End Property Private _AsUSB2 As Boolean = False
''' <summary> ''' Check is some USB device are connected to the NA. ''' </summary> Public Sub CheckUSB()
Dim intDeviceNr As Integer Dim strDeviceName(1) As String
' Get USB device name GetConnectedUSBDevices(intDeviceNr, strDeviceName)
TempStr = strDeviceName(0) & " --- Val trim : " & strDeviceName(0).Trim("\"c) & " --- Val USB1 : " & S_Path.USB1 & " --- Val USB2 : " & S_Path.USB2
Select Case intDeviceNr Case 0 AsUSB1 = False AsUSB2 = False
Case 1 ' During a simulation, we have "\USBDisk" as device name, and not "USBDisk". So if the value start with \, we are in simulation ' If _IsSimulation = False And strDeviceName(0).StartsWith("\") ' _IsSimulation = True ' End If
' Check witch USB device is detected If strDeviceName(0).Trim("\"c) = S_Path.USB1.Trim("\"c) Then AsUSB1 = True : AsUSB2 = False If strDeviceName(0).Trim("\"c) = S_Path.USB2.Trim("\"c) Then AsUSB1 = False : AsUSB2 = True
Case 2 AsUSB1 = True AsUSB2 = True
End Select
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Eject the curent USB drive. ''' </summary> Public Sub EjectUSB
' Only if it's not a simulation and we have a path If Not _IsSimulation And _USBpath <> "" Then
' Eject current usb drive If _USBpath = S_Path.USB1 Then EjectUSBDevice(S_Path.USB1) AsUSB1 = False ElseIf _USBpath = S_Path.USB2 Then EjectUSBDevice(S_Path.USB2) AsUSB2 = False End If End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Use the USB drive 1. ''' </summary> Public Sub SetUSB_1
' Only if it's not a simulation and we have a path If Not _IsSimulation And AsUSB1 Then ' Change current path USB_Path = S_Path.USB1 End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Use the USB drive 2. ''' </summary> Public Sub SetUSB_2
' Only if it's not a simulation and we have a path If Not _IsSimulation And AsUSB2 Then ' Change current path USB_Path = S_Path.USB2 End If
End Sub
#End Region
#Region "Transfert - Delete"
Private _deletePath As String
''' <summary> ''' Delete the file selected in "Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Externe" variable. ''' </summary> Public Sub Delete_FromFile
' If the file doesn't exist, exit with message box If Not System.IO.File.Exists(Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Externe) Then ' Msg: The file doesn't exist S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_FileMissing"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_DELETE) Exit Sub End If
' Save file path to delete _deletePath = Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Externe
' Ask user if he want replace the current recipe RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteFromFileReturn AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteFromFileReturn
' Msg: Do you want to delete the selected recipe from the USB device? Call S_PopUp.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteFileConf"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Warning, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.YesNo, ICON_DELETE)
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Response of user to delete an existing recipe ''' </summary> Private Sub _DeleteFromFileReturn(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteFromFileReturn
' If response is Yes, delete the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then
' Check if the path is valide If System.IO.File.Exists(_deletePath) Then ' Delete the file System.IO.File.Delete(_deletePath)
' Update list Call Fill_Externe Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Externe = "" Rcp.Transfert.Update = True
' Msg: The file on the USB device has been successfully deleted! S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteFileSuccess"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteFile"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Success, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_DELETE) End If End If
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Delete the recipe selected in "Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Local" variable. ''' </summary> Public Sub Delete_FromRecipe
Dim obj As Object
' Get recipe name obj = GetRecipeIngredientValue(Rcp.Transfert.Template, Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Local, "Name_User")
' Exit if recipe doesn't existe If obj Is Nothing Then ' Msg: The recipe or the ''Name_User'' ingredient is missing! S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_NameUserMissing"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Delete"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Erreur, ICON_SAVE) Exit Sub End If
' Save file path to delete _deletePath = Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Local
' Ask user if he want replace the current recipe RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteFromRecipeReturn AddHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteFromRecipeReturn
' Msg: Do you want to delete the selected recipe from the USB device? Call S_PopUp.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteMachineConf"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Delete"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Warning, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.YesNo, ICON_DELETE)
End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Response of user to delete an existing recipe ''' </summary> Private Sub _DeleteFromRecipeReturn(button As S_PopUp.DialogResult)
' Remove handler RemoveHandler S_PopUp.Response, AddressOf _DeleteFromRecipeReturn
' If response is Yes, delete the recipe If button = S_PopUp.DialogResult.Yes Then
' Delete recipe DeleteRecipe(Rcp.Transfert.Template, _deletePath)
' Update status SaveAllRecipes(Rcp.Transfert.Template) Call FileBackup
' Update list Call Fill_Local Rcp.Transfert.Pos_Local = -1 Rcp.Transfert.Sel_Local = "" Rcp.Transfert.Update = True
' Msg: The file on the USB device has been successfully deleted! S_Popup.MsgBox(GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_DeleteSuccess"), GetResourceString("THE_Rcp_Delete"), S_PopUp.MessageBoxIcon.Success, S_PopUp.MessageBoxButtons.OK, ICON_DELETE) End If
End Sub
#End Region
#End Region
#Region "Divers function"
''' <summary> ''' Remove and element from an array. ''' </summary> ''' <typeparam name="T">Array without the deleted value</typeparam> ''' <param name="arr">Source array</param> ''' <param name="value">Value to remove</param> ''' <returns></returns> Private Function Remove(Of T)(ByVal arr As T(), ByVal value As T) As T()
Dim index As Integer
' Get position of value index = Array.IndexOf(arr, value)
If index = -1 Then Return arr Else
Dim uBound = arr.GetUpperBound(0) Dim lBound = arr.GetLowerBound(0) Dim arrLen = uBound - lBound
If index < lBound OrElse index > uBound Then Throw New ArgumentOutOfRangeException( _ String.Format("Index must be from {0} to {1}.", lBound, uBound))
Else 'create an array 1 element less than the input array Dim outArr(arrLen - 1) As T 'copy the first part of the input array Array.Copy(arr, 0, outArr, 0, index) 'then copy the second part of the input array Array.Copy(arr, index + 1, outArr, index, uBound - index)
Return outArr End If End If End Function
Private Function RemoveAt(Of T)(ByVal arr As T(), ByVal index As Integer) As T() Dim uBound = arr.GetUpperBound(0) Dim lBound = arr.GetLowerBound(0) Dim arrLen = uBound - lBound
If index < lBound OrElse index > uBound Then Throw New ArgumentOutOfRangeException( _ String.Format("Index must be from {0} to {1}.", lBound, uBound))
Else 'create an array 1 element less than the input array Dim outArr(arrLen - 1) As T 'copy the first part of the input array Array.Copy(arr, 0, outArr, 0, index) 'then copy the second part of the input array Array.Copy(arr, index + 1, outArr, index, uBound - index)
Return outArr End If End Function
#End Region
